body:
So, me and Superdoughnut1 are new to this server. We got together in a skype call and started to defend 2 cores seperately, we then had an amazing idea: We each build an ACTUAL HOUSE surrounding the monuments. We won the match. Here are a few screenshots :)

Superdoughnut's House

My house (Outside shot)

My basement

My inside                                                                                                                                                              Hope you like our houses XD                                                                                                                                                      
 -Ango

title: When you get bored on this server

replies.body: Wow this is amazing! Haha nice job! :D
replies.body_tagged: Wow this is amazing! Haha nice job! :D

replies.body: This is actually a very smart and fun idea. It works especially well if you have someone else try to rush. I actually might build a hotel with one of my friends, Officer457. :)
